item.title: How to Create Branch in Github
item.author: Author
item.description: git clone XXX cd directory git branch XXX, create a branch check test or master, command-shift-P to master or test commit or publish through the third one

item.title: How to Subplot Pictures to One Figure
item.author: Author
item.description: Subplot pictures in one figure: from PIL import Image import matplotlib.pyplot as plt row_length = 5 column_length = 5 for i in range(row_length): for j in range(column_length): plt.subplot(row_length, column_length, i*5+j+1) im = Image.open("a.png") if j == 0: plt.ylabel("XXX") plt.yticks([]) plt.xticks([]) plt.imshow(im, cmap='gray') plt.tight_layout() plt.savefig("test.png")

item.title: Useful Tips When Writing Codes on Vscode
item.author: Author
item.description: Zip a folder: zip -r destination_folder_name.zip source_folder_name Unzip a folder: unzip source_folder_name.zip -d ./destination_folder_name/. Specifically, ./ means current directory, ../ means parent directory, ~ means home directory, / means root directory. Do not use / directory !!! In linux, terminal, etc., create a new file, touch XXX.cpp In terminal, command + T will help you open a new window check test or master command-shift-P to master or test 点第三个 commit or publish

item.title: How to write posts
item.author: Author
item.description: hugo new posts/first-post.md on FujiaoBlog write in content/posts/first-post.md, change draft to false In FujiaoBlog, hugo -t LoveIt cd public/, git add *, git commit -m "XXX", git push
